name: Gravity Switch (itch) (EXPLODINGDRAGON)
description:
Gravity Switch is a puzzle based game, inspired by Portal, and not because of the portals. All puzzles in this game will be based around one core mechanic, changing gravity. Anything that falls, rises too, use this to your advantage to make your way through each puzzle. Right now it's only a playground level, a few demo levels will come as soon as my friend finishes them.

Game Controls:

WASD - Move

CTRL - Crouch

E - Pick up / Interact

Space - Jump

Left Click - Throw

Extra Notes:

Some gravity triggers (EG: Fields around buttons) will not affect the player, this is normal

If you want, you can join the Dragon's Lair, and possibly get early updates on what I'm doing, or you can share your own work, gamedev or not, as long as it's SFW: https://discord.gg/hGbkQNjjgz
